title: Eowyn, Lady of Rohan (4C270)
text:
Set:	The Two Towers
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Rohan
Twilight:	2
Card Type:	Companion • Man
Strength:	6
Vitality:	3
Resistance:	6
Signet:	Theoden
Game Text:	Valiant. Response: If an unbound companion is about to take a wound, exert Eowyn and add (1) to prevent that wound.
Lore:	“Thus Aragorn…… and thought her fair, fair and cold, like a morning of pale spring that is not yet come to womanhood.”
Rarity:	C
